nodes.text: In 19 ABY, a swoop gang was active on the planet Pembric II. Its members included Langre and Barksy. That year, while acting as security for a meeting of their gang at the ThrusterBurn Tapcafe, members of the gang attempted to inflict injury upon smuggler chief Talon Karrde and his bodyguard, Shada D'ukal. D'ukal, a Mistryl Shadow Guard, dispatched three of them with ease, while Karrde handled the fourth.
